oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SEEJPH E-Collection 2014-2020
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jacobs, Hans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
SEEJPH E-Collection 2014-2020
Important publications in SEEJPH Since 2014 the South Eastern European Journal of Public Health published 15 volumes, time to celebrate and to reflect. With this intend our publisher Jacobs Company assembled still relevant papers published throughout the years. Here are the key themes:
European Health Policy Public Health Professionalization Public Health Ethics Primary Care Children and Youth Health Women Health Regional Perspective: South Eastern Europe The Global Perspective
We are proud to present this electronic collection to our readers and the general public. You can scroll through it at: https://www.jacobs-verlag.de/international-public-health/. You will be surprised how much you missed. Dr. Hans Jacobs, Lage, GermanyProf. Genc Burazeri, Maastricht, The Netherlands
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: South Eastern European Journal of Public Health (SEEJPH); Volume XV, 2020
South Eastern European Journal of Public Health (SEEJPH); Volume XV, 2020
